朝三暮四.definition: lit. say three in the morning but four in the evening (idiom); to change sth that is already settled upon; indecisive; to blow hot and cold

朝不保夕.definition: at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state; imminent crisis; living from hand to mouth

朝不慮夕.definition: at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state; imminent crisis; living from hand to mouth

朝中社.definition: abbr. for 朝鮮中央通訊社|朝鲜中央通讯社[Chao2 xian3 Zhong1 yang1 Tong1 xun4 she4]

朝乾夕惕.definition: cautious and diligent all day long (idiom)

朝令夕改.definition: to make frequent or unpredictable changes in policy (idiom)

朝勞動黨.definition: Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the ruling party of North Korea

朝向.definition: toward; to face; to open onto; to turn towards; orientation; exposure; Qibla (Islam)

朝夕.definition: morning and night; all the time

朝夕相處.definition: to spend all one's time together (idiom)

朝天.definition: to have an audience with the Emperor; to be presented at court; to look skyward; to look up

朝天區.definition: Chaotian district of Guangyuan city 廣元市|广元市[Guang3 yuan2 shi4], Sichuan

朝山進香.definition: to go on a pilgrimage and offer incense (idiom)

朝思暮想.definition: to yearn for sth day and night (idiom)

朝戰.definition: abbr. for 朝鮮戰爭|朝鲜战争[Chao2 xian3 Zhan4 zheng1], Korean War (1950-1953)

朝房.definition: reception room for officials (in former times)

朝拜.definition: to worship; to make customary deferences to; a pilgrimage

朝拜聖山.definition: a pilgrimage to a holy mountain

朝族.definition: Korean ethnic group of Jilin province and northeast China; same as 朝鮮族|朝鲜族

朝朝暮暮.definition: from dawn to dusk; all the time

朝歌.definition: Zhaoge, capital of the Shang dynasty 商朝; Zhaoge town in Qi county 淇縣|淇县, Hebi 鶴壁|鹤壁, Henan

朝歌鎮.definition: Zhaoge town in Qi county 淇縣|淇县, Hebi 鶴壁|鹤壁, Henan

朝氣蓬勃.definition: full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous; energetic; a bright spark

朝永振一郎.definition: TOMONAGA Shin'ichirō (1906-1979), Japanese physicist, 1965 Nobel prize laureate with Richard Feynman and Julian Schwinger

朝珠.definition: court beads (derived from Buddhist prayer beads)

朝生暮死.definition: lit. born in the morning and dying at dusk (idiom); fig. ephemeral; transient

朝秦暮楚.definition: serve Qin in the morning Chu in the evening (idiom); quick to switch sides

朝綱.definition: laws and discipline of imperial court

朝聞夕改.definition: lit. heard in the morning and changed by the evening; to correct an error very quickly (idiom)

朝花夕拾.definition: "Dawn Blossoms Plucked at Dusk", a collection of autobiographical essays by Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅[Lu3 Xun4]

朝見.definition: to have an audience (with the Emperor)

朝覲.definition: to give audience (of emperor); retainers' duty to pay respect to sovereign; hajj (Islam)

朝過夕改.definition: to correct in the evening a fault of the morning (idiom); to quickly amend one's ways

朝野.definition: all levels of society; the imperial court and the ordinary people

朝陽區.definition: Chaoyang, an inner district of Beijing; Chaoyang, a district of Changchun City 長春市|长春市[Chang2chun1 Shi4], Jilin; Chaoyang, a district of Shantou City 汕頭市|汕头市[Shan4tou2 Shi4], Guangdong

朝陽市.definition: Chaoyang, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

朝陽縣.definition: Chaoyang, a county in Chaoyang City 朝陽市|朝阳市[Chao2yang2 Shi4], Liaoning

朝露.definition: morning dew; fig. precarious brevity of human life; ephemeral

朝露暮靄.definition: morning dew, evening mist (idiom); ephemeral; impermanent

朝露溘至.definition: the morning dew will swiftly dissipate (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence

朝饔夕飧.definition: lit. breakfast in the morning and supper in the evening (idiom); fig. to do nothing but eat and drink

朝鮮.definition: North Korea; Korea as geographic term; Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]

朝鮮八道.definition: the eight provinces of Yi dynasty Korea

朝鮮太宗.definition: King Taejong of Joseon Korea (1367-1422), reigned 1400-1418

朝鮮字母.definition: hangul, Korean phonetic alphabet; Korean letters

朝鮮族.definition: Korean ethnic group in China (mainly in northeast China); the Koreans (major ethnic group on the Korean Peninsula)

朝鮮日報.definition: Chosun Ilbo, a South Korean newspaper

朝鮮核談.definition: talks on North Korea's nuclear program
